SendDataRequestPacket::SendDataRequestPacket (  const URL &  peer,
const byte *  data,
uint32  dataLen,
const char *  expectedReplyData,
dataType  type
) 
 

Creates a SendDataRequestPacket.

Parameters:
peer The host and port to send data to. Proto ssl/https gives ssl connection.
data The bytes to send to the host and port.
dataLen The number of bytes in data.
expectedReplyData The regular expression required in the reply from the peer.
